E-Mail Messages
Date: Sunday, 6/1/1988
Subject: Extension?
Hello Sir,
Are you interested in negotiating a contract extension?
You know, I'm in my final year. I'd like to stay here!

Sincerely,
Joe Wallis



Date: Tuesday, 6/3/1988
Subject: Good Game
Hello,
The fact that we won on a promotion day seems
to have a positive effect on our fan interest!
It increased slightly.

Sincerly,
Your PR Director



Date: Wednesday, 6/4/1988
Subject: Progress of Jose J. Bautista
Dear Sir,
Jose J. Bautista has an ERA of 3.53 at AA Reading Phillies!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 6/5/1988
Subject: Contract
Dear Sir,
I would like to negotiate a contract extension!
Please let me know if you are interested!

Regards,
Jerry Royster



Date: Saturday, 6/14/1988
Subject: Progress of Ben Rivera
Dear Sir,
Ben Rivera has nothing more to prove at A Spartanburg Phillies!
He has an ERA of 2.96 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director

to promote him soon!
